page.title: 13GRIMLEY & HOLT C.E. SCHOOL
page.content: There are 47 pupils aged 5 to 11. The headmaster, Mr.D.J.Forster, takes the older class and Mrs.J.Edwards the younger class. School starts at 8.45a.m. and ends at 3p.m. There is 1 hour for lunch plus two other breaks. All children have sandwiches at lunchtime. Most children travel by coach from Sinton Green and Holt Heath. Lessons include Mathematics, Eng- lish, Topic(Hist/Geog), Science, Mus- ic, Art, Craft, Needlework, P.E. and Games. On Wednesdays the Rev.P.H.Pol- lak takes morning Assembly and Scrip- ture with the older class. Swimming takes place at the Chantry High School Audio-visual equipment includes a computer, television, two cassette radios, a cassette recorder,a record player, a film strip/slide projector and screen.
